textAfterTable: Did learn a lot High School learning experience Login to rate or flag the reviews Amanda from Washington, DC 07/05/2012 Reviewer is Accepted here and planning to attend soon. Reviewer has been to campus. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 2 of 36 Categories Comments Campus Safety Security on campus was great . Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus During the program, a classmate of mine would bring some treats every month for the class, to mark the months we have completed into the program. That's all she did, counted how many days more before we graduated. Food and Dining I took my snacks and lunch with me to school. Dorm Life I travelled everyday using the metro to school.
